text: The 1905 Philadelphia Phillies season was a season in Major League Baseball. The Phillies finished fourth in the National League with a record of 83 wins and 69 losses. == Offseason == === City Series === In the 1905 pre-season City Series against the Athletics, the two teams played eight games between April 1 and 12, 1905, alternating games between the A's Columbia Park and the Phillies' Philadelphia Park. The Phillies won the third, fifth, seventh, and eighth games as the teams split the 1905 series four games to four. == Regular season == The 1905 Philadelphia Phillies === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
